About Calling Code.

Copyright Â© 2017 by Ryoichi Tsunekawa. All rights reserved.

Calling Code Regular weight is licensed under the SIL Open Font License, Version 1.1

There are two formats to suit your needs. TrueType(.ttf) and OpenType(.otf).

Calling Code has 4 styles.
 
  Calling Code Family
    |
    |____ Calling Code Regular  <-- Only Regular weight is licensed under SIL Open Font License 1.1
    |____ Calling Code Italic
    |____ Calling Code Bold
    |____ Calling Code Bold Italic
  
FAQ about Calling Code Regular.

    Q_ Can I use Calling Code Regular for a commercial product?
    A_ Yes, you can.
    Q_ Can I use Calling Code Regular on a web page via css @font-face?
    A_ Yes, you can.
    Q_ Can I donate to you?
    A_ Yes, please visit http://dharmatype.com/support
    Q_ Tell me the license in a little more detail.
    A_ Please read http://scripts.sil.org/OFL

2017.05.31 Version 1.000 released
